nodes.text: Reega II was an astronomical object in the galaxy where the human Lindon Javes was recruited by the Galactic Empire into the Imperial Starfighter Corps.

Reega II was mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, where it is listed in Aurebesh on the datapad of Terisa Kerrill. It shares its name with the Reega system, a star system in the Demetras sector from Star Wars Legends.
